sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Soul Cleave deals 10% increased damage and has a 25% chance to shatter 1 Lesser Soul fragments from a target it hits.
(4) Set: Consuming a Soul Fragment increases the damage and healing of your next Fel Devastation by 2%, up to 30%.
Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Metamorphosis for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 10 sec.
(4) Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!

spells.description:
Equip: Taking damage has a chance to grant you an Adrenal Surge, causing you to gain 2,191 Agility and lose 310 Mastery for 12 sec.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

effects.display_string: Set: Soul Cleave deals 10% increased damage and has a 25% chance to shatter 1 Lesser Soul fragments from a target it hits.
(4) Set: Consuming a Soul Fragment increases the damage and healing of your next Fel Devastation by 2%, up to 30%.
Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Metamorphosis for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 10 sec.
(4) Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,241 Agility. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 71,230 Nature damage over 8 sec.
Equip: Your attacks have a chance to mark their targets as Dead Ahead. Attacking the marked target grants 1,084 Critical Strike for 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times.

Equip: Taking damage greater than 25% of your health grants you 2,449 Avoidance and increases healing taken by 10% for 10 sec. This effect may only occur every 90 sec.

Falling damage reduced.
Equip: Damaging a target has a low chance to call upon the power of the Blessed Weapon Grip, granting you 10 stacks that increase your highest secondary stat by 185. These stacks fade over 30 sec.
